content.description: Follow the line up the obvious nose arete.  This is the tallest section of the retaining wall.  Steady crimpers the whole way up.  Don't biff it at the top, which is a no fall zone.
content.location:
Head south down Broadway.  Turn left at Crescent St.  Turn right on 3rd. St. E.  Turn left at 10th Ave. E.  Take first right onto 6th St. E.  Take 2nd right onto 12th Ave. E. 

  Find the parking lot with the cinder block retaining wall behind it.  The retaining wall is where the nose is located.

content.description: The Stout campus has many buildering problems to keep the local rock junkie busy.  Most all local climbers are Stout students who reside most of their time to the UW Stout (Stout Adventures) indoor rock wall.
